pages.text: Crystal Balls are common divination tools.$(br2)When used, they will give the caster a fortune, at the cost of some $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)ME$() drawn from a nearby $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)Altar$().$(br2)Additionally, Crystal Balls may be used for scrying. When used with a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$(), it will give precise information on the target.
